# Index

> **Navigation Hub** - All documentation for the 5th Semester BSc.CSIT Exam Preparation Materials Project

---

## Navigation

**New here?** Start with: [START_HERE.md](./START_HERE.md) ‚Üí [README.md](../../README.md)

**Need specifications?** See: [5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md](./5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md)

**Ready to work?** Follow: [QuickStart_Guide.md](./QuickStart_Guide.md)

**Want visuals?** Check: [WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md](./WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md)

---

## All Documents

### START_HERE.md

**File:** `START_HERE.md`  
**Purpose:** Quick start guide - your first read  
**Read time:** 15-20 minutes  
**Read when:** Right at the beginning

**Contains:**

- Project overview
- Step-by-step next actions
- Progress trackers
- Pro tips and FAQs
- Immediate action plan

**Best for:** Getting started quickly without reading everything

---

### README.md

**File:** `../../README.md` (repository root)  
**Purpose:** Main repository documentation  
**Read time:** 15-20 minutes  
**Read when:** After START_HERE.md

**Contains:**

- Project overview and goals
- Subject list and structure
- How to use the repository (student perspective)
- Study plans overview
- Success metrics

**Best for:** Understanding what students will see

---

### 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md

**File:** `5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md`  
**Purpose:** Complete project specifications  
**Read time:** 60-90 minutes  
**Read when:** Before starting any AI agent work

**Contains:**

- Detailed subject information
- Complete repository structure
- AI agent roles and responsibilities (detailed)
- Output format templates for all 4 files
- Analysis methodology
- Success criteria and checklists

**Best for:** AI agents and detailed understanding of requirements

---

### QuickStart_Guide.md

**File:** `QuickStart_Guide.md`  
**Purpose:** Practical execution guide  
**Read time:** 30-45 minutes  
**Read when:** When ready to start actual work

**Contains:**

- Prerequisites checklist
- Step-by-step workflow for each phase
- Prompt templates for AI agents
- Quality checklists
- Troubleshooting guide
- Timeline recommendations

**Best for:** Following the process step-by-step during execution

---

### CS4.5_Template_Example.md

**File:** `CS4.5_Template_Example.md`  
**Purpose:** Format reference for Claude Sonnet 4.5 output  
**Read time:** 45-60 minutes  
**Read when:** Before creating CS4.5.md files

**Contains:**

- Complete CS4.5.md structure with examples
- All sections explained
- Format specifications
- Study plan templates
- Expected content in each section

**Best for:** AI agents and quality verification

---

### WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md

**File:** `WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md`  
**Purpose:** Visual representation of workflows  
**Read time:** 20-30 minutes  
**Read when:** To visualize the overall process

**Contains:**

- ASCII workflow diagrams
- Process flowcharts
- Progress tracking visuals
- Time breakdown charts
- Success formula visualization

**Best for:** Visual learners and quick process overview

---

### PROJECT_SUMMARY.md

**File:** `PROJECT_SUMMARY.md`  
**Purpose:** Complete project overview and summary  
**Read time:** 30-40 minutes  
**Read when:** After START_HERE, before deep dive

**Contains:**

- What has been created
- File purposes and locations
- Next steps breakdown
- Success criteria
- Timeline estimates
- FAQ section

**Best for:** Getting comprehensive overview before starting

---

### üìù WhatWeAreDoing.prompt.md

**File:** `WhatWeAreDoing.prompt.md` (existing)  
**Purpose:** Original task definition  
**Read time:** 1 minute  
**Read when:** For context of the original request

**Contains:**

- Original prompt/task definition

**Best for:** Understanding the initial request

---

## Order by Role

### You're the Project Owner

1. **START_HERE.md** (15 min) - Understand what to do
2. **README.md** (15 min) - See student perspective
3. **PROJECT_SUMMARY.md** (30 min) - Get complete overview
4. **WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md** (20 min) - Visualize process
5. **5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** (60 min) - Deep dive specs
6. **QuickStart_Guide.md** (30 min) - Execution details
7. **CS4.5_Template_Example.md** (45 min) - Format reference

**Total time:** ~3.5 hours for complete understanding

### You're an AI Agent (Claude Sonnet 4.5)

1. **5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** - Your role section
2. **CS4.5_Template_Example.md** - Format to follow
3. **QuickStart_Guide.md** - Phase 2 workflow

### You're an AI Agent (GPT-5)

1. **5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** - Your role section
2. **QuickStart_Guide.md** - Phase 3 workflow
3. **CS4.5_Template_Example.md** - For reference

### You're an AI Agent (Gemini 2.5 Pro)

1. **5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** - Your role section
2. **QuickStart_Guide.md** - Phase 4 workflow

### You're an AI Agent (Gemini 3 Pro)

1. **5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** - Your role section
2. **QuickStart_Guide.md** - Phase 5 workflow
3. **Reference:** https://github.com/aakku106/4thSem_impQtns/tree/main/DBMS/imp_qtns/2DayPrep

### You're a Student (Future)

1. **README.md** - Start here
2. Then navigate to subject folders

---

```
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ CS4.5_Template_Example.md        ‚Üê Format reference
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md         ‚Üê Visual workflows

[Subject Folders - To be populated]
DAA/, SAD/, Cripto/, SM/, WT/, SEIT/
```

## Document Purposes at a Glance

| Document                    | Primary Audience  | Primary Purpose       | Length    |
| --------------------------- | ----------------- | --------------------- | --------- |
| START_HERE.md               | Project Owner     | Quick start           | Medium    |
| README.md                   | Students          | Repo overview         | Long      |
| 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md | AI Agents + Owner | Complete specs        | Very Long |
| QuickStart_Guide.md         | AI Agents + Owner | Execution steps       | Long      |
| CS4.5_Template_Example.md   | AI Agents         | Format reference      | Very Long |
| WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md    | Visual Learners   | Process visualization | Medium    |
| PROJECT_SUMMARY.md          | Project Owner     | Complete overview     | Long      |
| INDEX.md                    | Everyone          | Navigation            | Short     |

| Visual workflow         | WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md    |
| Overview and summary    | PROJECT_SUMMARY.md          |
| How to navigate docs    | INDEX.md (this file)        |

| Task                      | Document to Use                                  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |

| See the big picture       | README.md, PROJECT_SUMMARY.md                    |

| Check output format       | CS4.5_Template_Example.md                        |
| See process visually      | WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md                         |
| Create CS4.5.md           | CS4.5_Template_Example.md, QuickStart_Guide.md   |
| Create G5.md              | 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, QuickStart_Guide.md |
| Create G2.5_p.md          | 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, QuickStart_Guide.md |
| Create 2DayPrep guide     | 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, QuickStart_Guide.md |

- [ ] 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md
- [ ] QuickStart_Guide.md

- [ ] QuickStart_Guide.md (step-by-step)
- [ ] CS4.5_Template_Example.md (format reference)
- [ ] 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md (specifications)

### 4: Quality Check (Verify Against)

- [ ] CS4.5_Template_Example.md
- [ ] QuickStart_Guide.md (checklists)
- [ ] 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md (success criteria)

## Concepts Across Documents

### 4 AI Agents

**Mentioned in:** All documents  
**Detailed in:** 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, QuickStart_Guide.md

1. **Claude Sonnet 4.5** ‚Üí Strategic Analysis ‚Üí CS4.5.md
2. **GPT-5** ‚Üí Detailed Q&A ‚Üí G5.md
3. **Gemini 2.5 Pro** ‚Üí Visual Materials ‚Üí G2.5_p.md
4. **Gemini 3 Pro** ‚Üí 2-Day Emergency Prep ‚Üí survival_guide.md

### 4 Output Files (Per Subject)

**Mentioned in:** All documents  
**Templates in:** 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, CS4.5_Template_Example.md

1. **CS4.5.md** - Strategic exam analysis (~5000-7000 words)
2. **G5.md** - Detailed Q&A guide (~8000-12000 words)
3. **G2.5_p.md** - Visual learning materials (~4000-6000 words)
4. **2DayPrep/survival_guide.md** - Emergency prep (~2000-3000 words)

### 6 Subjects

**Listed in:** All documents  
**Details in:** 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md, README.md

1. DAA - Design and Analysis of Algorithms
2. SAD - System Analysis and Design
3. Cryptography
4. SM - Simulation and Modeling
5. WT - Web Technology
6. SEIT - Society and Ethics in IT

### 4 Study Plans

**Mentioned in:** README.md, CS4.5_Template_Example.md  
**Created in:** CS4.5.md (per subject)

1. 30-Day Comprehensive Plan
2. 15-Day Crash Course
3. 7-Day Intensive Prep
4. 2-Day Survival Guide

## Path

```
START_HERE.md
     ‚Üì
README.md + PROJECT_SUMMARY.md
     ‚Üì
WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md
     ‚Üì
5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md (deep read)
     ‚Üì
QuickStart_Guide.md (reference while working)
     ‚Üì
CS4.5_Template_Example.md (format reference)
     ‚Üì
START CREATING CONTENT!
```

---

## Pro Tips for Using Documentation

### Time Reading

1. **Don't read everything at once** - It's overwhelming
2. **Start with START_HERE.md** - It guides you
3. **Skim visuals first** - WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md
4. **Deep dive later** - When you need specific details

### Work

1. **Keep QuickStart_Guide.md open** - Step-by-step reference
2. **Keep CS4.5_Template_Example.md open** - Format reference
3. **Refer to 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md** - When in doubt
4. **Use INDEX.md** - To find what you need quickly

### AI Agents

1. **Read your specific role section** - In 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md
2. **Follow the template** - CS4.5_Template_Example.md or similar
3. **Use the prompts** - In QuickStart_Guide.md
4. **Cross-verify** - Check other agents' outputs

---

## Learning Path

### (Never seen the project)

**Time:** 1 hour

1. START_HERE.md (15 min)
2. README.md (15 min)
3. WORKFLOW_VISUAL_GUIDE.md (20 min)
4. PROJECT_SUMMARY.md (10 min skim)

**Result:** Understand what the project is and how it works

### (Ready to start work)

**Time:** 3 hours

1. Review beginner materials (30 min)
2. 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md (90 min deep read)
3. QuickStart_Guide.md (30 min)
4. CS4.5_Template_Example.md (30 min skim)

**Result:** Ready to collect data and start first subject

### (Actively working)

**Time:** Ongoing reference

1. QuickStart_Guide.md (constant reference)
2. CS4.5_Template_Example.md (format checking)
3. 5thSem_Generation_Prompt.md (specification verification)
4. INDEX.md (quick navigation)

**Result:** Producing high-quality output consistently
